xwikidoc.name: MyCurriki
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.jeremi
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.jeremi
xwikidoc.content: #set($mmng = $xwiki.getPlugin("asset_manager")) 1.1 Published Assets #set($assetList = $mmng.getPublishedCollection()) #if($assetList.size() > 0) #foreach($asset in $assetList) #set($title = $asset.get("title")) #if(!$title || $title.length() == 0) #set($title = "Untitled") #end * [$title>$asset.fullName] #end #else None #end 1.1 Unpublished Assets #set($assetList = $mmng.getUnpublishedCollection()) #if($assetList.size() > 0) #foreach($asset in $assetList) #set($title = $asset.get("title")) #if(!$title || $title.length() == 0) #set($title = "Untitled") #end * [$title>$asset.fullName] #end #else None #end
